Test Name: Brazil Nut, IgE with Reflex to Brazil Nut Component, IgE, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify IgE antibodies to Brazil nut allergen and its specific components, aiding in the diagnosis and management of Brazil nut allergy.
Container: Red-top or gold-top serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer for IgE testing
